# epilot-product_tax (Data Source)

Tax DataSource

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "epilot-product_tax" "my_tax" {
  hydrate = true
  strict  = false
}
```

- `hydrate` (Boolean) Hydrates entities in relations when passed true
